name: byakuya-md
description: A multi-device WhatsApp bot with otaku-themed features using pairing code authentication

scripts.clean: rm -rf auth_info && echo 'âœ… Auth data cleared' && npm start
scripts.clean:win: rmdir /s /q auth_info && echo âœ… Auth data cleared && npm start
scripts.reset: rm -rf auth_info node_modules package-lock.json && npm install && echo 'âœ… Complete reset done'
scripts.reset:win: rmdir /s /q auth_info node_modules && del package-lock.json && npm install && echo âœ… Complete reset done
scripts.test: node -e "console.log('âœ… Basic test passed'); require('./utils/logger').info('Logger test passed');"
scripts.test:plugins: node -e "require('./plugins/loader').loadPlugins('./plugins').then(plugins => console.log('âœ… Plugins test passed:', plugins.length + ' loaded'));"
scripts.logs: tail -f -n 50 logs/bot.log 2>/dev/null || echo 'No log file found'
scripts.logs:win: type logs\bot.log 2>nul || echo No log file found
scripts.help: echo "ðŸ“‹ Available commands: npm start, npm run dev, npm run clean, npm run reset, npm run setup"
scripts.docker:clean: docker stop byakuya-md 2>/dev/null || true && docker rm byakuya-md 2>/dev/null || true && echo 'âœ… Docker cleanup done'
scripts.backup: cp -r auth_info auth_info_backup_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S) && echo 'âœ… Backup created'
scripts.backup:win: xcopy auth_info auth_info_backup_%date:~-4,4%%date:~-10,2%%date:~-7,2%_%time:~0,2%%time:~3,2%%time:~6,2% /E /I /H >nul && echo âœ… Backup created
scripts.status: echo "ðŸ¤– Bot Status:" && ps aux | grep node | grep index.js || echo "Not running"
scripts.status:win: echo ðŸ¤– Bot Status: && tasklist /fi "imagename eq node.exe" /fo table || echo Not running
scripts.kill:win: taskkill /f /im node.exe 2>nul || echo No node process found
scripts.update: git pull && npm install && npm run clean
scripts.postinstall: echo "âœ… Dependencies installed. Run 'npm start' to begin!"
